about_the_game:
——Doctor, Nurse, or Patient?

Join the girls' doctor game now💉

The Rose-Hued Uniforms character skin expansion pack is officially released, available for purchase!

◆ Content Description ◆

This DLC is an add-on for the Steam game "DreamlessGirl." After purchase, you can unlock the "Rose-hued Uniforms" series of character skins——

◆ Skin List ◆

Mudeng - Sickly Girl

Plague Sister - Injection Pharmacist

Zhizi- Chief Surgeon

◆ How to Use ◆

1. After purchasing and downloading the DLC, you can activate the corresponding skin node on the character tab in the 【Mindscape】 (※Certain game progress is required to unlock the skin function);

2. In the character selection interface before entering a stage, click the up or down arrows to switch to the corresponding skin;

3. After applying the skin and entering the stage, the character's model and illustration will change, adding a unique twist to the shooting experience.

◆ How to Use ◆

1. After purchasing and downloading the DLC, you can activate the corresponding skin node on the character tab in the 【Mindscape】 (※Certain game progress is required to unlock the skin function);

2. In the character selection interface before entering a stage, click the up or down arrows to switch to the corresponding skin;

3. After applying the skin and entering the stage, the character's model and illustration will change, adding a unique twist to the shooting experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: intel i3-2100/AMD A8-5600ki
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630/Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

  • Processor: intel i3-2100/AMD A8-5600ki
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630/Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Storage: 100 GB available space
